attributes.action: End all coronavirus restrictions and get back to normal life before is too late.
attributes.additional_details:
Life must go on. British companies that have taken generations to build will be put out of existence, all for something not much worse than flu. All the while people are dying of cancer, stroke and heart attack because they are scared to get healthcare, or unable due to reduced capacity. I myself have had two important hospital appointments investigating a possible serious illness cancelled. I’m not alone in this. 
Vulnerable need to take responsibility and protect themselves. It’s that simple.
attributes.background:
The coronavirus Covid-19 is not a threat to the vast majority of population. It makes no sense imposing social distancing as it creates fear.
Lockdowns and hysteria are causing economic ruin and death. We need to get back to normal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
